## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G24300](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G24300)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AMT1;3, ATAMT1;3</u>
- **Gene Name:** ammonium transporter 1;3, AMMONIUM TRANSPORTER 1;3
- **Description:**   ammonium transporter 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
